ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: I am a passionate front-end developer with a focus on modern frameworks, clean responsive design and high-performance web applications with real added value.
ABOUT.DEVELOPER_DESC: As a software developer, I enjoy contributing my knowledge of JavaScript and Angular to projects. I work in a solution-oriented manner, am a team player and am always motivated to learn new technologies and methods in order to develop myself professionally.
ABOUT.TEAMWORK_DESC: In various projects, I have learned to solve problems both independently and as part of a team in a structured way and to place value on clean, maintainable code according to clean code principles.

SKILLS.TITLE: My skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I am familiar with these technologies and have realized projects.
SKILLS.QUESTION: Looking for another skill?
SKILLS.MOTIVATION: I am motivated to expand my knowledge and learn new programming languages.
